A1: ALAMEEN is an AI chatbot builder, it trains ChatGPT on your data and lets you add a chat widget to your website. Just upload a document or add a link to your website and get a chatbot that can answer any question about their content
Q2: What should my data look like?
A2: Currently, you can upload one or multiple files (.pdf, .txt, .doc, .docx), paste text, or add a link to your website to be scraped
Q3: Can I give my chatbots instructions?
A3: Yes, you can edit the base prompt and give your chatbot a name, personality traits and instructions on how to answer questions ex. (only answer in Arabic)
A4: The content of the document is hosted on secure GCP/AWS servers in us-east
Q5: Can I share a chatbot I created?
A5: Yes, by default any chatbot you create is private but you can change the setting to make it public and send it to anyone.
Q6: How can I add my chatbot to my website?
A6: You can embed an iframe or add a chat bubble to the bottom right of your website. To do that, create a chatbot and click Embed on website. You  can also use the API to communicate with your chatbot anywhere!
A7: Yes, ALAMEEN supports about 95 languages. You can have your sources in any language and ask it questions in any language.

Ans1: Yes, just by signing up you get 30 message credits and 1 chatbot (400k characters). You can use these to test out ALAMEEN and see if it works for you.
Ans2: One AI response with gpt-3.5-turbo (the default) costs 1 message credit. One AI response with gpt-4 costs 20 message credits. You can change which model your chatbot uses in the chatbot settings. The difference is because gpt-4 costs 15x (prompt tokens) and 30x (completion tokens) what gpt-3.5-turbo costs on OpenAI.
Ans3: One chatbot means a chatbot that contains specific data and can answer any question about this data. Even if it was created using multiple documents.
How many users can use my chatbot?: How many users can use my chatbot?
Ans4: If your chatbot is private, only you have access to it. If you decide to make it public, anyone with the link will be able to interact with it.
When are my message credits renewed?: When are my message credits renewed?
Ans5: Your message credits are renewed at the start of every calendar month regardless of when you subscribed. So if you subscribe on the 15th of March, your credits will be renewed on the 1st of April.
How do I know how many characters are i: How do I know how many characters are in my document?
Ans6: Once you attach your document(s) for upload, ALAMEEN will show you the character count of all the attached documents.
Can I upload multiple files to one chatb: Can I upload multiple files to one chatbot?
Ans7: Yes, if you have a paid plan you can upload multiple files to one chatbot. Just click ctrl (windows) or cmd (mac) and select as many files as you want.
How much data can I give one chatbot?: How much data can I give one chatbot?
How does the unlimited plan work?: How does the unlimited plan work?
Ans9: You get 40,000 message credits included in the plan when you subscribe. Every message after that will use your OpenAI API key that you can add in your account page. So you get the cheapest possible price per message after you hit the limit.
